alert.note: Alert for Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN SCHUYLKILL COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Schuylkill Haven, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Schuylkill Haven, Orwigsburg, Friedensburg, Renningers, Lake Wynonah, Cressona, Auburn, Deer Lake, Port Clinton, Summit Station, Landingville and Penn State Schuylkill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
